ModMetaData.name: [SYR] Set Up Camp
ModMetaData.author: Syrchalis
ModMetaData.description:
Set up camp, once again! For all your caravan managing needs, you can now set up camp anywhere. Camp map size is customizable and map duration is unlimited.
Originally by Nandonalt Re-coded and improved by Syrchalis Assistance provided by spd, potatoclip
